articles.title: US adopts crypto in mortgage risks as Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac update asset models
articles.author: Cryptoslate
articles.summary: Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac must treat cryptocurrency reserves as eligible assets when they measure risk on single-family mortgage loans effective immediately. The two government-sponsored enterprises must draft plans that show how they will promote homeownership to credit-worthy borrowers, according to FHFA Director Willian J. Pulte.

articles.title: Fannie Mae, Freddie Mac ordered to consider crypto as an asset when buying mortgages
articles.author: J. David Ake
articles.summary: The head of the agency that oversees Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac wants the mortgage giants to consider accepting a homebuyer's cryptocurrency holdings in their criteria for buying mortgages from banks. William Pulte ordered the agencies Wednesday to prepare a proposal for consideration of crypto as an asset for reserves when they assess risks in single-family home loans.
